Thinking about choosing 1984 as my next hosting company. Primarily because of their cheap VPS and their promise to use only 100% renewable energy for their servers, (which shouldn't be that hard either in a country like Iceland 😅). 🇮🇸

But I don't know why choosing hosting has to be such a mess, maybe a too saturated market ┐( ∵ )┌ Anyway, any input would be greatly appreciated. This is just what my quick research concluded in terms of cheap, reliable and green hosting... 😊
